title: Has anyone else given certain champions strange nick names that you use?
body:
I have given champions some nicknames. It's just habbit for me to call them this rather than their actual names half the time.
Some of them are a little... strange.

replies.body:
{{champion:8}} Tampon
{{champion:134}} Lissandra (not mine, just hearing it **a lot**)

Why Vi's "7"?

> [{quoted}](name=Vistha Kai,realm=EUNE,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=uiim6WYW,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-06-26T00:13:18.380+0000)
>
> {{champion:8}} Tampon
> {{champion:134}} Lissandra (not mine, just hearing it **a lot**)
> 
> Why Vi's "7"?

VI = 6 in Roman Numerals

Wait, 7? It should say 6, may bad.

VI is 7 in roman numerals.

Edit: I'm an idiot. VI is 6

Funny you call {{champion:16}} God. I was in a game with some friends, and whilst trying to escape, one of my friends went through the jungle instead of down the lane with the rest of us, and the enemy team chased him. "You're in God's hands now," I said. Then I looped down through the river, caught up to him, trapped three of the enemy team in an equinox and healed him to full and got him out. "GOOD THING I'M GOD"

I did this for the rest of the game.

> [{quoted}](name=Drackolus,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=uiim6WYW,comment-id=000e,timestamp=2015-07-02T04:46:20.474+0000)
>
> Funny you call {{champion:16}} God. I was in a game with some friends, and whilst trying to escape, one of my friends went through the jungle instead of down the lane with the rest of us, and the enemy team chased him. "You're in God's hands now," I said. Then I looped down through the river, caught up to him, trapped three of the enemy team in an equinox and healed him to full and got him out. "GOOD THING I'M GOD"
> 
> I did this for the rest of the game.

I actually have nicknames for literally every champion, but I don't feel like pasting all 126 of them.

This one came from someone calling her a "Generous God" when she used to give mana. One of my friends gave one of my friends mana back and it gave them like 11 mana and they were like "Thanks for the 11 mana you fucking asshole" so the Raka just said "I'm a generous god." and it killed me inside. Surprisingly enough, that 11 mana saved that teammate. They were LeBlanc so that gave them enough mana to Distortion out of the way of an incoming Thresh hook.
Never look a gift goat in the mouth.

>Surprisingly enough, that 11 mana saved that teammate. They were LeBlanc so that gave them enough mana to Distortion out of the way of an incoming Thresh hook.

And let me guess, she conveniently forgot about that 11 mana from the "fucking asshole" that saved her life?
Yes.
Figures.
